segments.text: Whoa , look at all those ice cream choices !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , that is a lot of choices . What is your favorite ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I love anything with chocolate the best .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Is there any kind of ice cream you don't like ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I really don't like any ice cream with nuts in it .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I haven't ever cared for that myself .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Have you ever had garlic ice cream ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It was . Let's stick with the regular choices today , though .
segments.speaker: S2
